mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (user_id, book_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bookId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.name as userName FROM comment c LEFT JOIN `user` u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.book_id = #{bookId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
SELECT c.*, b.title as bookTitle FROM comment c LEFT JOIN book b ON c.book_id = b.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
